111112.content:
You and every other male in the school have been shrunk down to half an inch in height. The test is basically a survival test where only the strong willed will live, if you can survive until the end of the school day without being killed in some horrible way.

You are incredibly freaked out right now, as is everyone, your teachers looked incredibly scared but pulled themselves together and said that we each need a team of 3 since there where 60 of us, so you, Ethan and Daniel where in a team and each team split up to try to survive on there own.

this was difficult already, you had been fortunate enough that no teacher or student came out into the hallway.... but that was about to change. As you and your team where resting, you all felt the earth shaking beneath you, "what was that?" questioned Ethan, "i don't know, but it sounds dangerous, lets get out of site" you replied. So the three of you ran beside a locker and saw the most enormous foot land down right beside you, just where you where resting. The giant stood there for a second looking around her, you looked and noticed it was your English teacher, Ms. Galvin, she nearly always wore shoes that would show off her foot and you always had a slight foot fetish, so while she was standing there, you looked over at her foot and say she was wearing beautiful thin soled, thong strapped sandals, she had always had beautiful feet, so you couldn't resist and reached out and rubbed her beautiful big toe which was the same height as you if not bigger! Miss Galvin walked on and you nearly went with her if you hadn't pulled your hand away on time.

you where all standing there, mesmerized, as the beautiful teacher casually strolled down the hallway, you all stood there, looking like you had all seen a ghost, when you heard another huge 'boom', a door to a classroom you where all just in opened and out came.......

info.description:
ok lets get started..... you are a student at st.catherains. every year they have an initiation to see who gets in and who dies in the process. here are the main characters......

1:you: you are 14 and you are taking the initiation.

2:connor: your best friend and he is taking it with you.

3: Ethan: your other best friend who is taking it with you.

4: Nikki: a girl you seriously have a crush on but you know she is way out of your league plus she acts like you don't exist.

there are more people also but we'll get to them in the story.


rules:


1:no sex
2:feet are allowed
3:vore can be used also
4:you may kill a character off
5:no gay stuff.


OK ...... enjoy
